author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
In the courtyard of the man born of December's gloom,
Oppenheimer, the seer of the world's fearful bloom.
In an arrow’s flight, brought forth a devouring doom,
Yet spent his days, musing on civilization's loom.

Divergent paths, woven by the loom of time, do twist,
Generations 'pon generations, through history's mist.
Born of diverse eras, intersecting conflicts persist,
In each epoch's tale, a saga does subsist.

Behold Binance, its wealth born of cryptic refrain,
Thousand souls dismissed, in the pursuit of gain.
The merciless scourge of progress, a sage's bane,
Such tales of sorrow, the love's quill shall dutifully sustain.

feedItems.title: J. Robert Oppenheimer's Defense of Humanity
feedItems.description: After helping invent the atomic bomb, the physicist spent decades thinking about how to preserve civilization from technological dangers, offering crucial lessons for the age of AI.

feedItems.title: Talkin' 'Bout Our Generations: How They Shape (Almost) Everything in 2023
feedItems.description: Are you a boomer? Millennial? A member of Gen Z or X? ​As this collection of 20 stories explores, the ways we eat, dress, travel and scroll all depend a lot on when we were born.

feedItems.title: Crypto exchange Binance is cutting a big chunk of its workforce. Over 1,000 people have been fired in recent weeks, according to a person familiar with the moves.
feedItems.description: Crypto exchange Binance is cutting a big chunk of its workforce. Over 1,000 people have been fired in recent weeks, according to a person familiar with the moves.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
Forged in the smithy of learnèd hall 
Where debt once bound as iron chain.
By proclamation, shed it all,
A mighty boon for mind's domain. 

Fierce as Sunna's blistering path,
Across southern lands it wields its might,
A heat wave's cruel, unbridled wrath,
Dreadful omen of day turned night.

The court's decree holds fast as Mjölnir's might,
In spurn of FTC's clamoring brawl,
With Microsoft's hoard in victorious light,
The warriors of Activision fall.

feedItems.title: A total of $39 billion in federal student debt will be forgiven as part of a one-time adjustment to loan repayment plans announced last year, the Education Department said.
feedItems.description: A total of $39 billion in federal student debt will be forgiven as part of a one-time adjustment to loan repayment plans announced last year, the Education Department said.

feedItems.title: A dangerous heat wave stretching across the southern U.S. had 93 million people facing what forecasters said could be a scorching, potentially deadly weekend.
feedItems.description: A dangerous heat wave stretching across the southern U.S. had 93 million people facing what forecasters said could be a scorching, potentially deadly weekend.

feedItems.title: An appeals court denied a last-ditch bid by the FTC to halt Microsoft's planned acquisition of videogame publisher Activision Blizzard.
feedItems.description: An appeals court denied a last-ditch bid by the FTC to halt Microsoft’s planned acquisition of videogame publisher Activision Blizzard.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
In the realm of Redstone, a wistful tale unfurled,
Facing fearsome money-Imps, as debts have been twirled.
Just as goats pick paths on cliffs, taking each risk in turn,
Fear not, for midst these quaking stones, a wise lesson is learned.

With Biden as the rabbit, swiftly through green fields he hopped,
Raising golden kernels high, while rivals' efforts flopped.
Through his vigour, his journey in April's sweet caress,
Exceeding leading foxes, in their monetary stress.

Now hear of Putin, the snail, with iron helmet glistened,
Speak of ghostly warriors, that simply have not existed.
Behold the dog that barks no more, once a force, now shorn,
Fell upon its own sword's edge, in the light of dawn.

feedItems.title: National Amusements, the family holding company of Shari Redstone, is in negotiations with creditors to renegotiate some of its debt, after disclosing it is facing heightened financial risks.
feedItems.description: National Amusements, the family holding company of Shari Redstone, is in negotiations with creditors to renegotiate some of its debt, after disclosing it is facing heightened financial risks.

feedItems.title: Biden raised a combined $72 million with the DNC since the launch of his re-election bid in April, his campaign said, pulling in more than the leading Republicans running for the 2024 nomination.
feedItems.description: Biden raised a combined $72 million with the DNC since the launch of his re-election bid in April, his campaign said, pulling in more than the leading Republicans running for the 2024 nomination.

feedItems.title: Putin said the Wagner paramilitary group "simply doesn't exist," as he moves to dismantle an organization that was critical to Moscow's war effort in Ukraine before it turned on the Russian establishment in a short-lived mutiny.
feedItems.description: Putin said the Wagner paramilitary group “simply doesn’t exist,” as he moves to dismantle an organization that was critical to Moscow’s war effort in Ukraine before it turned on the Russian establishment in a short-lived mutiny.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Upon the House of Red their rule proclaimed,
A pot of gold for sword and shield they gained,
In taverns, cries for diversity, tamed,
Whilst unity 'gainst opposition, maintained.

Now Tucker and Patel, two mead-swilling kin,
Seek coin for news, where twitt'ring birds begin,
An empire of talk, through thick and thin,
In town square Twitter, their voices to spin.

Lo the market soars, as larks at dawn’s light,
Dow and Nasdaq in March's mimic flight,
Gainst the scale, they show their bullish might,
In Fortune's faith, all prospers in sight.

feedItems.title: The Republican-controlled House narrowly passed a $886 billion defense-policy bill loaded with measures restricting abortion access, transgender healthcare and diversity efforts in the military, as McCarthy kept his party largely united amid strong Democratic opposition.
feedItems.description: The Republican-controlled House narrowly passed a $886 billion defense-policy bill loaded with measures restricting abortion access, transgender healthcare and diversity efforts in the military, as McCarthy kept his party largely united amid strong Democratic opposition.

feedItems.title: Tucker Carlson and former White House adviser Neil Patel are seeking to raise funds to start a media company that would potentially use Twitter as its backbone, according to people familiar with the matter.
feedItems.description: Tucker Carlson and former White House adviser Neil Patel are seeking to raise funds to start a media company that would potentially use Twitter as its backbone, according to people familiar with the matter.

feedItems.title: The Dow and Nasdaq recorded their best weekly gains since March, rising 2.3% and 3.3%, respectively, while the S&P 500 added 2.4% in a broad-based advance.
feedItems.description: The Dow and Nasdaq recorded their best weekly gains since March, rising 2.3% and 3.3%, respectively, while the S&P 500 added 2.4% in a broad-based advance.
